alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Delaware (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 7:12PM CDT until July 28 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Buchanan County in northeastern Iowa... Northwestern Delaware County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 711 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from County Road W 33 And 187 to near Otterville to near Washburn, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Independence, Manchester, Jesup, Fairbank, Edgewood, Winthrop, Hazleton, Quasqueton, Lamont, Rowley, Aurora, Dundee, Masonville, Stanley, Wapsipinicon Golf Course, Manchester Airport, Fontana County Park, Monti, Otterville and Jakway Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
